headline: VICI Properties (VICI): A Cash-Heavy Tech Company With Reliable Dividends
summary: VICI Properties Inc. (NYSE:VICI) is included among the 10 Cash-Rich Dividend Stocks to Buy Right Now. VICI Properties Inc. (NYSE:VICI) is a gaming, hospitality, and experiential property real estate investment trust that engages in the ownership, acquisition, and financing of gaming, hospitality, and experiential properties.
